items.title: Machine learning in Pytorch
items.abstract: This is a 5-day basic course on machine learning for life science researchers. I have created and presented the teaching material for the introduction to PyTorch and have created one of the 3 data challenges on histopathological image classification.

items.title: Introduction to Python
items.abstract: A 2-day programming crash course in Python. I have been involved in restructuring the course in 2022 and created and tought material on basic programming synthax and functions. I have participated in teaching the course and TAing in 2022.

items.title: From Excel to R
items.abstract: A 2-day programming crash course in R. I have helped create and present teaching material for tidyverse and have been a TA from 2021-2022.
